fields.name: Country or region
fields.title: Country or region
fields.description: Country or region exactly matching the country or region in top left panel.

fields.name: Survey Id
fields.title: Survey ID
fields.description: A unique identifier for the survey (each survey must have a unique name)

fields.name: Year
fields.title: Year
fields.description: The year in which survey was conducted; year of survey fieldwork midpoint if survey spanned multiple years.

fields.name: Sex
fields.title: Sex
fields.description: The biological sex.  Must be "both", "male" or "female".

fields.name: HIV Status
fields.title: HIV Status
fields.description: The HIV status. Must be "all", "negative" or "positive".

fields.name: Estimate
fields.title: Estimate
fields.description: Estimate for proportion ever tested for HIV; as a percentage (e.g. 87.6 rather than proportion 0.876).

fields.name: Standard Error
fields.title: Standard Error
fields.description: Standard Error of the estimate (as a percentage). Should take into account survey design effects.

fields.name: Lower Confidence Interval
fields.title: Lower Confidence Interval
fields.description: Lower limit of the 95% confidence interval of the survey estimate (as a percentage).

fields.name: Upper Confidence Interval
fields.title: Upper Confidence Interval
fields.description: Upper limit of the 95% confidence interval of the survey estimate (as a percentage).

fields.name: Counts
fields.title: Counts
fields.description: Unweighted counts of the number of survey respondents included in the stratification group.

title: UNAIDS Shiny90 Survey Data Input
description: If data does not exist, please indicate so with the value "NA" and ignore any warning given by Excel.
